title: Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit       The Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial is a unit of National Mall and Memorial Parks.  This presidential memorial is located along the western shore of the Tidal Basin, taking visitors on a walk through time as FDR's four terms in office are chronicled through quotes carved in stone and fascinating bronze artwork. Directions Operating Hours and Seasons Things to Do
